summary: Phase 8 Testing - New Tools and File Upload Endpoint. All 17 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend chat UI with file upload button fully functional. All 12 tools registered including the 6 new ones.

issues: Console warning: nested <button> elements causing hydration error - non-breaking but should be fixed

passed_tests: tools.list RPC - returns all 12 tools (6 original + 6 new)
Frontend attach button (paperclip) visible and clickable
Frontend file picker opens on attach button click
Frontend file preview shown after upload
Frontend remove attached file button works
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: SessionSidebar has nested <button> elements causing React hydration warning - should restructure to avoid button-in-button

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all UI elements and file upload flow working)

seed_data_creation: Created test files for upload tests (test_upload.txt, test_data.json, readme.md, data.csv, test_doc_for_parsing.txt)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 8 adds 6 new tools (browse_webpage, system_info, http_request, analyze_image, transcribe_audio, parse_document) and a file upload endpoint at POST /api/upload. Frontend has a paperclip attach button in chat UI. All tools are registered and working via agent chat. The analyze_image and transcribe_audio tools call real OpenAI APIs (GPT-4o vision and Whisper). WebSocket uses JSON-RPC protocol with token auth.
